text:
@JohnRentoul Mandela. The Truth & Reconciliation commission.
If HE could, if Black South Africans could, why not us.

Northern Ireland. After 30 years of Sectarian hatred, fear & death. They created the GFA & the killing stopped.

Our enemy is Covid19. We must fix the problems, not the blaim.
